current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To replace the Director of the Bureau of Consumer
		  Financial Protection with a 5-person Commission, to bring the Bureau into the
		  regular appropriations process, to provide for a safety and soundness check,
		  and for other purposes.

sponsor.#tail:
introduced the
			 following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

committee-name.#text:
Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban
			 Affairs
